Title: SSGRG Title Page
Body: If you are looking for specific results (improvement in productivity, performance) that can be delivered by generators, or the relationship of our work to design patterns, check out (in order): Reengineering a Complex Application... P2: A Lightweight DBMS Generator Memory Simulators and Software Generators Automated Software Evolution via Design Patterns... For further information, please contact Don Batory (batory@cs.utexas.edu) .
